ValidationRule.description: Program Lead is Required for Product Specification Record to move the Stage from Define to Design
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED( Stage__c ), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( Stage__c ), 'Define'), ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, 'Design'), ISBLANK( Program_Lead__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: “Program Lead” is required to update the Stage.
